import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./styles/TeacherProfile.css"; export default function TeacherProfile() { const [teacher] = useState({ name: "Mr. Ahmed Raza", subject: "Computer Science", email: "ahmed.raza@school.edu.pk", employeeId: "EMP-2025-015", phone: "0300-9876543", cnic: "35201-9876543-1", department: "Science Department", }); return (

Teacher Profile

{teacher.name}

{teacher.subject}

); }
